text: You are in a dark room. You can't see anything.

choices.text: "Try to remember how you got here."

text: "You find a small object in your hand. It feels like a key."
"You unlock the door and find yourself in an empty room with a single window at the far end. As you approach, you notice that there's something behind the glass - a treasure chest!"
"No one answers, but you hear muffled voices and footsteps outside."

choices.text: "You knock on the door to announce your presence."

text: "If you decide to investigate further, you find out that it's just some neighbors having a party. You can either join them or continue with your original mission."

"If you choose to hide and observe, you notice a suspicious figure lurking around the corner. After they leave, you cautiously approach the house only to discover a hidden entrance leading underground."

"If you knock on the door to announce your presence, the person inside invites you in for tea, but as soon as you enter their home, you realize that it's a trap and must fight off the inhabitants before escaping."
"A memory flashes back: You were exploring an old abandoned house with some friends when the power went out."

choices.text: "Search for a way out of the house."
"Stay with your friends in the living room."

text: "You descend into the dark, musty basement and find an old dust-covered journal. Reading it reveals clues to hidden treasures within the house."
"You stumble upon a secret door that leads you outside, allowing you to escape from the haunted house."
"As you huddle with your friends in fear, a ghostly apparition appears and begins speaking to you about its tragic past. You learn of an ancient curse placed on the house by a vengeful spirit."
